system.novice: If Navigator Wins Opposed Test, for 1d5 + 1 per Degree of Success days Target suffers from any weapon they use having the Unreliable Trait and any test they make having -10. The cursed character may spend a fate point to end the effect. Only one instance of this power can be in effect at a time.
system.adept: Target suffers -20 instead of -10 on all tests. If anyone uses a Psychic technique within 5 metres of them, it automatically manifests Psychic Phenomena even if it wouldn't normally do so (including Fettered Powers).
system.master: Anyone in 5 metres of target that uses a psychic power automatically rolls on Perils of the Warp instead of Psychic Phenomena.
